      • validateAmounts

        public boolean validateAmounts()
        Returns:
        true if the sum of all the transfer amounts doesn't exceed the unapplied amount for the t-account owner. false if any of the amounts are null or there aren't enough funds unapplied.

      • getTransferTargets

        public FundsTransfer[] getTransferTargets()
        Returns:
        the FundsTransfers

      • getSourceOwner

        public TAccountOwner getSourceOwner()
        Returns:
        TAccountOwner that is the source of the transfer.

      • setSourceOwner

        public void setSourceOwner(TAccountOwner sourceOwner)
        Parameters:
        sourceOwner - TAccountOwner that is the source of the transfer.

      • setSourceUnappliedFunds

        public void setSourceUnappliedFunds(UnappliedFund selectedUnappliedFunds)
        Parameters:
        selectedUnappliedFunds - The unapplied funds to be used as the source t-account for this transfer

      • getSourceUnappliedFunds

        public UnappliedFund getSourceUnappliedFunds()
        Returns:
        the unapplied funds that are currently select to be used as the source t-account for this transfer

      • setSourcesAndApprovalActivitiesIfRequired

        public void setSourcesAndApprovalActivitiesIfRequired()
        Set the Source Unapplied for each FundsTransfer. Set the approval for each FundsTransfer.

      • isApprovalActivitiesRequired

        public boolean isApprovalActivitiesRequired()
        Returns:
        true if one or more of the funds transfer requires an approval activity.

      • getSourceType

        public TAccountOwnerType getSourceType()
        Returns:
        source T-Account owner type

      • getTargetType

        public TAccountOwnerType getTargetType()
        Returns:
        target T-Account owner type. This method might return null if called outside of the context of the UI.

      • setTargetType

        public void setTargetType(TAccountOwnerType targetType)
        Parameters:
        targetType - target T-Account owner type
